'''Mythcon 24''' was the twenty-fourth annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference. 

*'''Theme:''' "Down the Hobbit-hole & Through the Wardrobe: Fantasy in Children's Literature"
*'''Guests of Honor:''' Carol Kendall (fantasy author) and Jane Yolen (fantasy scholar and author)
*'''Chairman:''' David Lenander
